The claim was made by Republican Nationa: 2. The claim was based on a report aired on the Fresno-based TV station KMPH, a Fox affiliate.
The report stated that the average E: R. wait in California is currently over five hours and blamed Obamacare for the long wait times.
However: upon closer examination, it was found that the alleged 5-hour wait time was measured before the health care law took effect, raising questions about the accuracy of the claim.
